page.title: 20N.Upottery:Peace and quiet
page.content: Many of us have settled in this part of Devon to escape the noise and polluted atmosphere of cities;and indeed our valley has pure air and the silence we sought.Well,...most of the time! We do have the rich odour of fertilisers on the fields for a few days in the year,and our peace is sometimes shattered by the sound of tractors at work.But these are a necessary part of country life.What is far less pleasant is the appalling screech of military aircraft or the buzz of a helicopter.On summer Sundays we can hear the drone of stock-car racing on the old aerodrome.The sound of the holiday traffic on the A-roads however,hardly reaches us;and the tourists who come to us for "Bed and Breakfast"do not disturb the peace and tranquillity of this lovely valley.
